body.name: Mobile WiFi Hotspot | KuWFi 4G LTE Unlocked Wi-Fi Hotspot Device | Portable WiFi Router with SIM Card Slot for Travel-Friendly Mobile Travel Router Perfect for AT&T/T-Mobile Users
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 52 mins
features: 【What KuWFi L100US is】A Portable 4G WiFi Hotspot Travel Router With screen display & TF card slot & Lithium battery 2400mAh, Internet access to internet via HSPA/LTE Data SIM Card. with battery powered ,use for indoor or outdoor without broadband place,put it into your pocket, enjoy WiFi anytime and anywhere

【Work Mode & Band】4G LTE Router work with 4G to WiFi, Support 4G SIM card. Mainly applicable to US，Compatible with AT&T/T-Mobile, our 4G LTE Router works with 4G to WiFi, and supports a variety of bands such as B2/B4/B5/B12/B17, providing a smooth connection across the US."

【Connect with Ease】Our Travel Partner Wi-Fi Hotspot allows up to 10 users within a 50M distance. Simply insert the SIM card and enjoy a seamless Wi-Fi connection with friends and colleagues using this compact and easy-to-carry 4G LTE router.

【User Tips】Upon receiving the product, remove the battery's insulating film and insert the SIM card. Should there be any difficulty in connectivity, consider disabling the SIM card's PIN code and modifying the APN via the router IP address: 192.168.0.1. Please ensure the SIM card is activated and does not support roaming service, Virtual SIM Card, or IoT SIM Card."

【Customer Service】For 30 days after the date of purchase, return your undamaged KuWFi product and receive a full refund for ANY reason.12-month warranty for quality-related issues For 12 months after the date of purchase we take care of all quality-related issues with a REPLACEMENT OR FULL REFUND

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: KuWFi Travel Partner 150Mbps LTE Mobile WiFi Hotspot 4G LTE Router (US Verison) 4G LTE Router provides WiFi hotspots, which users can connect mobile phone and computer to access to internet Support Cat4 DL/UL 150/50 Mbps in max, High Speed more Stable, Enjoy 4G network life anytime and anywhere With screen display show 4G signal ,how many users connect ,WiFi SSID and password 4G SIM Card Mode(Default): Pulg in Micro SIM Card, KuWFi 4G LTE Router will identify 3G/4G automatically. for some SIM Card should be update APN Notes: The screen has a protective film (please tear off if it is scratched)The battery is equipped with an insulating sheet (please remove the battery insulating sheet if it cannot be turned on and charged)

Technical Specifications of KuWFi Mobile WiFi Hotspot L100 4G LTE Category Cat4: Downlink up to 150Mbps/Uplink up to 50Mbps Cellular Frequency Band 4G FDD B2/B4/B5/B12/B17 Main Application Area Mainly used in USA/Canada/Mexico 2.4GHz WiFi Speed 2.4G 802.11 b/g/n (300 Mbps) SIM Card Slot With Micro Size SIM Card Slot(No including SIM card) Power Lithium battery 2400 mAh, Working 5-8 hours TF Card slot Support SD card(up to 32GB)(TF Card Not included) Users Up to 10 Users, 50M Distance

Personal Travel, Anywhere Internet Perfect companion to keep you connected and entertained while traveling or enjoying the outdoors Business Travel, Fully Connected Stay connected and productive with a secure connection anywhere. Or offload to WiFi or Ethernet at your hotel or business Reliable Home Internet vs. DSL Enjoy faster, more reliable mobile Internet connections on up to 10 devices as you stream, surf, chat and email at the same time

Package List 1 * KuWFi Travel Router 1 * Manual 1 * Battery 1 * Charging Cable Battery Lithium battery 2400 mAhWorking 5-8 hoursLow power consumption and long battery life(please charge in full when first time charger) Notes: The screen has a protective film (please tear off if it is scratched)The battery is equipped with an insulating sheet (please remove the battery insulating sheet if it cannot be turned on and charged) Card Slot 1 * Micro SIM card slot(SIM Card Not included) 1 * TF Card slot(TF Card Not included) Support SD card(up to 32GB). insert TF Card, it can be a card reader ,also be one U disk

How to log in to the web and set up the network Log in Web Log in web UI 192.168.0.1, and see web interface show work Cellular Connection detail including Internet Connection Internet Setting On this page, you can set the network mode, preferred network mode Automatic connection / manual setting Configure APN If your SIM card is installed correctly and meets the frequency band supported by this router, but cannot connect to the network, please set the correct APN manually(Click PDN1" to open the page) Fill in APN Please fill in the correct APN information in the corresponding positionIf you don’t know APN, please check it on your cell phone (the product pictures have tutorials)Or you can call the SIM operator to get the correct APN information

4G Router L100US 4G Router L100EU 4G Router MF903-M1-US 4G Router CPF908 4G Gigabit Router C900-L Network Frequency 4G LTE FDD: B2/B4/B5/B12/B17 & 3G WCDMA: B1 4G LTE FDD: B1/B3/B5/B7/B8/B20 4G LTE TDD: B38/B39/B40/B41 & 3G WCDMA: B1/B8 4G LTE FDD: B2/B4/B5/B12/B17 & 3G WCDMA: B1 4G LTE FDD: B2/B4/B5/B12/B17 & 3G WCDMA: B2/B4/B5 4G LTE FDD: B2/B4/B5/B12/B13/B14/B66/B71 & 3G WCDMA: B2/B4/B5 LTE UE-Category Cat4 Cat4 Cat4 Cat4 Cat4 Router Version US Version EU Version US Version US Version US Version Data Transfer Rate WiFi: 300M & 4G LTE: 150M (Cat4) WiFi: 300M & 4G LTE: 150M (Cat4) WiFi: 300M & 4G LTE: 150M (Cat4) WiFi: 300M & 4G LTE: 150M (Cat4) WiFi: 1200M & 4G LTE: 150M (Cat4) 2.4 GHz ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ 2.4G+5.8G Main Application Area Mainly used in USA/Canada/Mexico Mainly used in Europe, Middle East and other regions Mainly used in USA/Canada/Mexico Mainly used in USA/Canada/Mexico Mainly used in USA/Canada/Mexico Gigabit Port ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product! Very reliable
reviews.reviewText: It is a reliable and convenient WiFi solution, perfect for staying connected on the go. Its quick setup, compact design, and impressive battery life make it ideal for travel and everyday use. The device delivers fast and stable internet connection in various environments, without any dropouts or lag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It doesn't work
reviews.reviewText: Finally I was able to return to Europe and use this. After buying the appropriate sim card and following the instructions it "radiates" but can not connect to the internet, none of my devices will. I had to use my phone to tether other devices. Also the instructions included is vague andWritten so small you need a microscope to read it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It works fine once you change the setting to "LTE Preferred" as another review pointed out.Drawbacks: 1) case really hard to pry open but since I use it at home I leave the cover off, 2) instructions are barebones and in tiny type but you can download a 14- page manual online, 3)no battery charger included, but I already had a mini-usb charger at home.Speed is slow but that had to do with my cell carrier and other traffic on the cell tower, not a fault of this unit.Update: I had a problem with the device during the one-year warranty period (but after the one month return period and seller solved the problem to my satisfaction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Si pero no
reviews.reviewText: El producto si sirve pero no es compatible con mi tarjeta pero lo probé con otra y si funciona bien

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Was ok until stop working
reviews.reviewText: Delivered on time and in good condition worked for a few days then stop won’t charge at all connection to devices are ok just wasn’t expecting it to stop working while was on vacation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This does NOT work with Cricket Wireless
reviews.reviewText: Not compatible with cricket. Called different reps 4 times. Looked it up on ATT and the picture that pulls up of the imdi number is a totally different pocket Wi-Fi. Called ATT several times and had a really hard time explaining what a portable Wi-Fi was. Contacted the seller and they were like what’s cricket wireless? Do not buy if you have cricket and if you have ATT call in advance and be SURE that it’s compatible. If you know away around this to make it compatible for cricket please let me know.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Died after 9 months of daily use.
reviews.reviewText: It was good while it last in the 9 months that I left it plugged into the charger next to my desk. Luckily it managed to work when I first inserted the T-Mobile prepaid SIM card which is sold for USA use. To keep track of my data usage as shown on the tiny screen, it took me many months to find out how to reset the counter to zero whenever I change to a new SIM.Go to main menu, press bottom right corner "Reset" button. OR, press Router tab, then Reboot button. Shut down this router, replug and counter will show something like 3600 B, then gradually rise to MB and GB as you surf the web. If it doesn't reset to something close to zero, repeat the Reset buton process as described.To pay US$50 for 9 months use is pricey, so I have now moved to USB plug-in router which I got for US27. It has 4G but does not show LTE. However, although this KuwFi router displays LTE on the tiny screen, I still could not get any fast internet, very often sputtering when watching youtube movies, or just the CNN video news.I was willing to pay US50 only because it was difficult to find such a router which run easily on USA T-Mobile SIM card without the hassle of tweaking other brands. That is because most routers in USA default to AT&T cards, and only some wiz nerds know how to tweak them to run other brand carrier SIM.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Portable router, alterative to company wireless service
reviews.reviewText: Small portable router. Work excellent. Worth to recommend to friends!

But this to replace a WiFi stick I've been using at my camo for security camera. My connection was always slow and would take forever for a camera to connect. Set this one up today, seamless connection with Rogers SIM card. Much stronger connection and cameras not connect in seconds. So far, seems to be a great little device. Will update should I have any problems.

Pensé que no me funcionaría y funcionó a la perfección sin problema solo instalé el chip, lo encendí y funcionó a toda su capacidad, quien sabe si Unefon se de cuenta, pero mientras me ha funcionado de maravilla

reviews.reviewTitle: Not so Great little LTE router
reviews.reviewText: I needed a LTE router to be able to connect more devices on a LTE sim card (Sharing the same data plan).This device does the job.It seem to support up to 10 devices, which in my case is more that I required.The screen does turn off after a few seconds.I don't know about the stability of the router.... time will tell.So far It seem to do the job well. If situation changes I will update this review.Updated review- every time you remove the battery the date reset to 01-01-2014- connection is unstable, every few days it lose connection and stop working, it’s connected but internet is not working- contacted seller, suggested to return it.- no way to set automatic rebook- do not buy if you want to keep it always on- an old cell phone with tethering would be better
EL ARTICULO VIENE RAYADO DE LA PANTALLA COMO SI TUVIERA USO PREVIO
Amazing product with an amazing customer staff behind it!
